```{r setup}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(plotly)
```



# My Workflow

Data Import
```{r}

adae <- read_csv("https://rhoinc.github.io/data-library/data/clinical-trials/adam/adae.csv")
adae
```

Data Viz
```{r}
ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = SEX, fill = AESEV, weight = AGE) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()
```

Interactive Viz
```{r}
v1 <- ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = SEX, fill = AESEV, weight = AGE) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(v1)
```
